name: Camlist
headline: The super app for pets
description: Camlist is the super app for pets, a video-first, mobile-only, social platform that allows pet breeders and pet parents to interact, transact, and care for their furry friends all under one roof.

founders.name: Moustafa Mahmoud, Founder
founders.description: 3x Technical Founder, 15 years in tech. On a mission to empower the world to buy and sell through video.

generated_description:
**Camlist: Your Gateway to Finding the Perfect Pet**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W21, Camlist is revolutionizing how pet enthusiasts connect. Based in London, this nimble team of five has created a video-first mobile app designed to ensure that finding your dream pet is both safe and straightforward.

### Mission-Driven Approach
Camlist aims to be "The super app for pets." Its focus is on safety and welfare, establishing a new standard in pet rehoming. Whether you're a seasoned pet parent or a first-time buyer, the platform caters to everyone, promoting a trusted community for pet transactions.

### Key Features
1. **Video Listings**: Every pet is presented through video, allowing potential owners to see their future furry friends in real life.
2. **Secure Chat**: Communicate directly with breeders within the app, ensuring a safe exchange.
3. **Payment Protection**: Transactions are secured within the app, with options for 0% financing available to help manage costs.
4. **100% Free for Breeders**: There's no charge for breeders, which encourages more transparency and diversity in listings.

### Why Camlist Stands Out
Camlist addresses common pain points in the pet adoption landscape—namely, the scams and frustrations often associated with current classified platforms. Testimonials from satisfied users emphasize its user-friendliness; one parent praised the app for allowing seamless communication and payments without ever leaving the platform.

### Download and Join the Community
Don't let the chaos of traditional pet searching deter you. Camlist provides a streamlined process that prioritizes user experience. Check it out on [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/ae/app/camelan/id1490601854) or [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.camelan).

In a world where finding a pet should be joyful rather than cumbersome, Camlist offers a refreshing alternative—a safe, mobile-first solution that brings together pet lovers with just a few clicks. 

For more information, visit [Camlist's website](https://www.camlist.com) and discover how easy pet rehoming can be.
